sn22.5:1.7: Rūpassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, saññāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, saṅkhārānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca, viññāṇassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca.
sn22.5:2.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rūpassa samudayo, ko vedanāya samudayo, ko saññāya samudayo, ko saṅkhārānaṃ samudayo, ko viññāṇassa samudayo?
sn22.5:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn22.5:3.3: Tassa rūpaṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn22.5:4.5: Tassa viññāṇaṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī.
sn22.5:6.1: Ko ca, bhikkhave, rūpassa atthaṅgamo, ko vedanāya …
sn22.5:7.1: Idha, bhikkhave, nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
sn22.5:8.3: Tassa rūpaṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā rūpe nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:9.2: Tassa vedanaṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā vedanāya nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:10.3: Tassa saṅkhāre anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā saṅkhāresu nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:11.2: Tassa viññāṇaṃ anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosāya tiṭṭhato yā viññāṇe nandī sā nirujjhati.
sn22.5:12.1: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpassa atthaṅgamo, ayaṃ vedanāya atthaṅgamo, ayaṃ saññāya atthaṅgamo, ayaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ atthaṅgamo, ayaṃ viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo”ti.
